# List of battles with most Bulgarian military fatalities

This article contains a list of battles and military campaigns with most Bulgarian military deaths.
Introduction
This article lists battles and campaigns in which the number of Bulgarian military fatalities exceed 1,000. The term casualty in warfare refers to a soldier who is no longer fit to fight after he or she has been in combat. Casualties can include killed, wounded, missing, captured or deserted.
